data.prayer: Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the state of Machinga.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Machinga, Malawi
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in Machinga to agree with you and with one another.
Please, convict the 4,065 believers in Machinga, Malawi to look to you as their only hope for strength and fruitfulness and life.
data.verse: "I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit; apart from me you can do nothing.

data.prayer: Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 4,065 believers in Machinga, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Gujarati people might believe through him.
Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the state of Machinga, Malawi.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Jesus, for those distressed and afraid in Machinga, Malawi, show them today that you give peace at all times and in every situation.
data.verse: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in all ways. The Lord be with you all.

data.section_summary:
the state of Machinga, Malawi has a population of 23,900.

We estimate Machinga has 4,065 people who might know Jesus, 14,023 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 5,812 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 5 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the state of Machinga access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”
